name: A heavy silver amulet inlaid with iolites
data: It increases the users wisdom slightly.
It increases the users intelligence slightly.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration tremendously.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'summon storm'.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
It gives tiny bonus to the spell 'neural internecion'.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'skyfire'.
This amulet will bestow its bearer an affinity with storm and thunder.
